titleInfo.title: Annotated Test data for the German Sentiment Analysis Shared Task 2: Subjective Phrase and Aspect Extraction from Product Reviews

mods.abstract: GESTALT: GErman SenTiment AnaLysis shared Task 2 addressed Subjective Phrase and Aspect Extraction (StAR) from product reviews. As training data, the USAGE data set was used dx.doi.org/10.4119/unibi/citec.2014.14. More information can be found here: https://sites.google.com/site/iggsasharedtask
